title: White Gorilla (1945, American film) written & directed by Harry Fraser | with Ray Corrigan

sources.title: White Gorilla (1945, American film) written & directed by Harry Fraser | with Ray Corrigan
sources.description:
A white gorilla is snubbed by his peers and grows lonely living in solitude. Cut off from his tribe, he begins behaving angrily towards hunters and locals, until he fights his way through the other gorillas, ultimately coming face to face with the king.

Original title: The White Gorilla (1945)


Black & White version: https://youtu.be/7hwISEsP9Hw

This film is available with subtitles in many language options.


Director & Writer: Harry L. Fraser
Genre: Adventure
Main Cast:
Ray "Crash" Corrigan 
Lorraine Miller 
George J. Lewis
Charles King 
Francis Ford 
Budd Buster 


00:00 Colorized movie (with subtitles).
01:05 Exploration of the jungle leads to mysterious encounters and unforgettable experiences.
06:51 Tragic consequences of ignoring warnings in a hostile jungle environment.
17:44 Exploration mission to find the cave of the Cyclops led by a blind explorer with a map.
23:03 Exploration of jungle leads to unexpected encounter with white gorilla.
34:47 Dangerous jungle plot unfolds as Hanley schemes against Bradford and the girl.
43:35 Encounter between white and black gorillas leads to unexpected outcome in the jungle.
56:52 Exploration mission concludes with unexpected encounters and a bittersweet ending.
